tweet: We need bipartisanship now more than ever. Congress must come together to find solutions to our nation's most challenging problems, including action to prevent another shutdown like the one we just had. That's why I introduced the End Govt. Shutdowns Act:  http://bit.ly/2G0In0H  https://twitter.com/RepBalderson/status/1090336016039362560 …

Saddened to learn of the fatal crash of a medical helicopter that departed from Mount Carmel in Grove City today. My heart goes out to the families of the passengers, including the pilot, who was from Sunbury. Sending my deepest condolences and prayers.

Grateful to have the support of fellow Ohioan @RepAGonzalez on my bill, the End Government Shutdowns Act.

As Members of Congress, it’s our job to make sure the government remains fully functional for all Americans. They deserve better. https://twitter.com/RepAGonzalez/status/1090328846174507008 …

I’m proud to introduce my first legislation, the House version of @SenRobPortman’s End Government Shutdowns Act. Shutdowns unfairly impact the lives of Americans—this would prevent them from happening in the first place. Read more:  http://bit.ly/2G0In0H  pic.twitter.com/xKdqQqQ9Yg

This Holocaust Remembrance Day, #WeRemember that a society that tolerates bigotry in any form is susceptible to hatred and oppression of all forms. Let's honor victims and salute WWII veterans who risked their lives in the name of freedom. @HolocaustMuseum

To Central Ohioans impacted by the shutdown, know that I'm working tirelessly to find a solution so we can end the shutdown and protect our southern border

I've now voted 3 times in support of paying furloughed workers during the partial #shutdown

ATTN Columbus area residents:

If you are a federal employee impacted by the partial lapse in govt. funding, I encourage you to call 1-833-876-0937 for information and assistance. This new support line will connect you with either @RepSteveStivers' @RepBeatty's or my office.

Today, I asked the Chief Administrative Officer to withhold my pay for the duration of the partial shutdown. It is unfair that our nation’s citizens are paying the price of political posturing. I stand with them, I hear them, and I am working for them. pic.twitter.com/ZGv3LDbTGY
Democrats want to #EndTheShutdown? There’s an easy way. It’s time to secure our borders and keep Americans safe. (3/3)

Forcing our citizens to pay the price of partisan games is shameful. For this reason, I urge my Democratic colleagues to come to the table so we can find a resolution and fully reopen our government. (2/3)

Border security is of the utmost importance in safeguarding our nation’s citizens. At the same time, this partial shutdown has gone on far too long, unfairly impacting Americans, including residents of my home district of #OH12. (1/3)
